channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dealer Known as ‘Ketamine Queen’ to Plead Guilty in Matthew Perry Case
item.description: Jasveen Sangha will plead guilty to selling the ketamine that killed the “Friends” star, prosecutors said. She could face decades in prison.

item.title: Hurricane Erin: No direct hit forecast for U.S., but flood risks prompt evacuations
item.description: Parts of North Carolina's Outer Banks are under mandatory evacuation orders, as the National Hurricane Center warns that Hurricane Erin could bring ta...

item.title: Immigration Enforcement Takes Key Role in Trump’s D.C. Crime Crackdown
item.description: Immigrants who live and work in the city say they want violent crime lowered but fear that ICE efforts could make it worse.

item.title: Hamas Accepts New Gaza Cease-Fire Proposal, Officials Say
item.description: It was unclear whether Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel was on board with the terms, which came as Qatar and Egypt were intensifying mediat...

item.title: Ex-Israel military intelligence chief said 50,000 Gaza deaths "necessary"
item.description: Israeli ex-military intelligence chief said Gaza's high death toll is "necessary" to send a message to Palestinians

item.title: Republican Bid to Help Trump Move Past Epstein Falls Flat
item.description: Republicans in Congress managed to recess for the summer without voting on the issue, but it has continued to dog them and awaits them when they retur...

item.title: Why Rip Currents From Hurricane Erin Are So Dangerous to the East Coast
item.description: Rip currents are the third leading cause of deaths from hurricanes, and they can happen on a sunny day hundreds of miles from the storm.

item.title: A Devastating Drought in Iran
item.description: A long lasting drought and severe heat this summer, compounded with government mismanagement of the country’s dams have led to an impending water cris...

item.title: Jimmy Lai: Closing arguments in Hong Kong tycoon national security trial begin
item.description: Lai is accused of colluding with foreign forces under the controversial national security law, which Beijing imposed.

item.title: 'SNL' castmember Bowen Yang shares a piece of 'cultural contraband' from his youth

item.title: Israel Is in Talks to Send Gazans to South Sudan, Officials Say

item.title: What to Know About Russia-U.S.-Ukraine Peace Talks
item.description: The president of Ukraine and his European allies are visiting the White House, after President Trump backed Russia’s plan to end the war.

item.title: Live Updates: Zelensky and European Leaders Press for Security Guarantees in Meeting with Trump

item.title: Russia Reaffirms Opposition to NATO Troops in Ukraine
